articles.title: About this site
articles.description: This is where I put my stuff
articles.contents:
I have been doing data science since long before data science was a thing.
I have applied it to telecom (Alcatel, BlackBerry, Akamai), fintech (Ario/ThinkingCapital), and eCommerce (Shopify).
I also teach an intro to data science course to MBA students at University of Ottawa.
You can find me on LinkedIn
or on Twitter
